verses.verse: The oracle <S%H9294><s%> concerning Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is riding <S%H7392><s%> on a swift <S%H7031><s%> cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and is about to come <S%H935><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> The idols <S%H457><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will tremble <S%H5128><s%> at His presence, <S%H6440><s%> And the heart <S%H3824><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will melt <S%H4549><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> them.

"So I will incite <S%H5526><s%> Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> against Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> And they will each <S%H376><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> against his brother, <S%H251><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> City <S%H5892><s%> against city, <S%H5892><s%> [and] kingdom <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom. <S%H4467><s%>

"Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will be demoralized <S%H1238><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> them; And I will confound <S%H1104><s%> their strategy, <S%H6098><s%> So that they will resort <S%H1875><s%> to idols <S%H457><s%> and ghosts <S%H9008><s%> of the dead, <S%H9008><s%> And to mediums <S%H178><s%> and spiritists. <S%H3049><s%>

"Moreover, I will deliver <S%H5534><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a cruel <S%H7186><s%> master, <S%H113><s%> And a mighty <S%H5794><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> will rule <S%H4910><s%> over them," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%> will dry <S%H5405><s%> up, And the river <S%H5104><s%> will be parched <S%H9162><s%> and dry. <S%H3001><s%>

And the canals <S%H5104><s%> will emit <S%H9107><s%> a stench, <S%H9107><s%> The streams <S%H2975><s%> of Egypt <S%H4693><s%> will thin <S%H1809><s%> out and dry <S%H9162><s%> up; The reeds <S%H7070><s%> and rushes <S%H5488><s%> will rot <S%H7060><s%> away. <S%H7060><s%>

The bulrushes <S%H6169><s%> by the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> by the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the Nile <S%H2975><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the sown <S%H4218><s%> fields <S%H4218><s%> by the Nile <S%H2975><s%> Will become <S%H3001><s%> dry, <S%H3001><s%> be driven <S%H5086><s%> away, <S%H5086><s%> and be no <S%H369><s%> more. <S%H369><s%>

And the fishermen <S%H1728><s%> will lament, <S%H578><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> those who cast <S%H7993><s%> a line <S%H2443><s%> into the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will mourn, <S%H56><s%> And those who spread <S%H6566><s%> nets <S%H9262><s%> on the waters <S%H4325><s%> will pine <S%H535><s%> away. <S%H535><s%>

Moreover, the manufacturers <S%H5647><s%> of linen <S%H6593><s%> made from combed <S%H8305><s%> flax <S%H6593><s%> And the weavers <S%H707><s%> of white <S%H9125><s%> cloth <S%H9125><s%> will be utterly <S%H954><s%> dejected. <S%H954><s%>
And the pillars <S%H8356><s%> [of Egypt] will be crushed; <S%H1792><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the hired <S%H7938><s%> laborers <S%H6213><s%> will be grieved <S%H99><s%> in soul. <S%H5315><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are mere <S%H389><s%> fools; <S%H191><s%> The advice <S%H6098><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s wisest <S%H2450><s%> advisers <S%H3289><s%> has become <S%H9059><s%> stupid. <S%H9059><s%> How <S%H349><s%> can you [men] say <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, "I am a son <S%H1121><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>"?

Well <S%H645><s%> then, <S%H645><s%> where <S%H335><s%> are your wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%>? Please <S%H4994><s%> let them tell <S%H5046><s%> you, And let them understand <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> Has purposed <S%H3289><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> have acted <S%H2973><s%> foolishly, <S%H2973><s%> The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Memphis <S%H5297><s%> are deluded; <S%H5378><s%> [Those who are] the cornerstone <S%H6438><s%> of her tribes <S%H7626><s%> Have led <S%H8582><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> astray. <S%H8582><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has mixed <S%H4537><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of distortion; <S%H5773><s%> They have led <S%H8582><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that it does, <S%H4639><s%> As a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man <S%H7910><s%> staggers <S%H8582><s%> in his vomit. <S%H9514><s%>

And there will be no <S%H3808><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> for Egypt <S%H4714><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> [its] head <S%H7218><s%> or tail, <S%H2180><s%> [its] palm <S%H3712><s%> branch <S%H3712><s%> or bulrush, <S%H100><s%> may do. <S%H6213><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> like women, <S%H802><s%> and they will tremble <S%H2729><s%> and be in dread <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the waving <S%H5130><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He is going to wave <S%H5130><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them.

And the land <S%H127><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a terror <S%H2283><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> it is mentioned <S%H2142><s%> will be in dread <S%H6342><s%> of it, because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the purpose <S%H6098><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He is purposing <S%H3289><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will be speaking <S%H1696><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> and swearing <S%H7650><s%> [allegiance] to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> one <S%H259><s%> will be called <S%H559><s%> the City <S%H5892><s%> of Destruction. <S%H2041><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and a pillar <S%H4676><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> near <S%H681><s%> its border. <S%H1366><s%>

And it will become <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> and a witness <S%H5707><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for they will cry <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of oppressors, <S%H3905><s%> and He will send <S%H7971><s%> them a Savior <S%H3467><s%> and a Champion, <S%H9538><s%> and He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> them.

Thus the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H3045><s%> Himself known <S%H3045><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in that day. <S%H3117><s%> They will even worship <S%H5647><s%> with sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering, <S%H4503><s%> and will make <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and perform <S%H9608><s%> it.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> striking <S%H5062><s%> but healing; <S%H7495><s%> so they will return <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and He will respond <S%H6279><s%> to them and will heal <S%H7495><s%> them.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be a highway <S%H4546><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the Assyrians <S%H804><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> into Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will worship <S%H5647><s%> with the Assyrians. <S%H804><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be the third <S%H7992><s%> [party] with Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and Assyria, <S%H804><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%>

whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has blessed, <S%H1288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> is Egypt <S%H4714><s%> My people, <S%H5971><s%> and Assyria <S%H804><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of My hands, <S%H3027><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> My inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>"
